title: I am a coach looking for Bronze&Silver teams

embed.description: League of Legends - Gaming - Esports - Community - Friendly - Populated - Serious - Mature

body:
Hey guys LB here. I am a new coach for VG and i'm currently looking for players and teams to coach them toward improving their gameplay!
I am a gold Mid-Jungle main been playing since season 3.
I can help teams in their coordination, understanding basic game mechanics such as lane control, objectives, ganks...
If you or your team is interested leave your posts here.
See you in-game!

replies.body:
We're a tournament team attempting to be the reigning champions in the amateur bracket of the NotSoStockGaming network, we are able to swap out players, and are currently searching for a coach. If you are interested I've added you in the LoL client, we are still looking for an ADC and a mid laner as a side note, since I rotated into the jungle, we had to to fire our old one he didn't do well in performance and was kind of toxic, and the mid laner quit unexpectedly.
          Signed, Kayoten.

   (Edit) If you wish to talk more message me on the LoL client.
Im a mid laner looking to join a team
My team is interested i added you in game.
lol I'm looking to join a team. Want to make one?
